title: S8E08 – "Unwelcome Guests" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you seven spine-chilling tales from author William Dalphin, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about terrifying transportation, devilish dirt, sinister stories, chilling caregivers, infectious infestations, barred basements, and abominable attractions.

                         
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
